content.question: The Concert of Europe, which existed between the Congress of Vienna and the outbreak of the Crimean War, operated as a

choices.label: commonwealth system that sought to promote an economic union of European nations
supranational institution that governed the continent of Europe
multilateral agency to control territories in the Middle East and Africa
loose forum to achieve consensus among the major powers on foreign policy questions
cultural exchange program among Russia, Prussia, Austria, and Britain

content.answer: loose forum to achieve consensus among the major powers on foreign policy questions

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
